==Story==
{{Description|"'Pursue the phantoms in the dark, expel them all, and hunt them down.'<br>Such is the origin of the name 'Marechaussee Hunter,'<br>Credited to one Cassiodor, who would be elevated to the revered title of 'Golden Hunter,'<br>But who saw the name as a humiliation."|title=Glorious Hunter: Marechaussee Hunter}}
